reviews.comments: Todo tal cual lo publicado
Todo perfecto! Esta buenisimo el depto, ubicacion: mejor imposible.
Excelente ubicación. Muy cómodo el departamento. El edificio tiene todas las comodidades. Súper recomendable.
El anfitrión muy bien, la atencion de Luciana excelente, el depto hermoso pero cómodo para 2 huéspedes, la ubicación excelente, la limpieza muy bien.La página Airbnb inrecomendable.
El departamento es muy lindo, equipado y tiene muy buena ubicación.  El barrio es muy lindo, cerca de plaza Serrano y Armenia. Recomendable!

El departamento de Savas tiene una ubicación excelente!!! Nos alojamos mi esposo y yo y la comodidad brindada era la expresada en su descripción. Nos esperaban y no tuvimos inconvenientes para comunicarnos si necesitábamos algo. Sin duda volvería.!

Excelente experiencia !!! muy comodo, bien equipado en zona de restaurantesy supermercados. 
Muy pendiente de todas nuestras necesidades. Piscina excelente, tiene bicicletas para alquiler.
Seguro volveremos
todo muy bien

Con esta es la segunda vez que pasamos unos días en este departamento y sin dudas volveríamos en otra ocasión.
Tanto la atención como el departamento mismo, siguen siendo altamente recomendables.

Somos una familia de Cordoba y estuvimos 7 días en el departamento. y la experiencia fue excelente en todo sentido.

Savas y Luciana se encargaron de toda la comunicación inicial via mail y después tuvimos contacto directo con Natalia y Fernando (el portero), todos fueron muy amables y siempre dispuestos a ayudarnos a que la pasemos bien.

El departamento es exactamente como se lo describe y como se ve en las fotos, resulta quizás un poco chico para una familia como nosotros con dos niños, pero los ambientes son muy prácticos y bien pensados. Todo en la habitación y en el edificio en general es de gran calidad.

La ubicación es inmejorable porque es una zona muy tranquila de bares y restaurantes con gente normal caminando por las calles hasta muy tarde. En un radio de 5 manzanas hay gran cantidad de restaurantes muy buenos que pudimos disfrutar con mi familia para cenar yendo y volviendo a pie. Actualmente en esas cuadras hay casi un policía en cada esquina así que la zona se siente y es muy segura.

Nosotros fuimos en auto y hay varios estacionamientos para dejarlo por las noches, al menos 2 que vi en un radio de dos cuadras, uno por Thames a 1 cuadra del depto y otro por Costa Rica a 2 cuadras.

Muchas gracias por todo y seguramente volveríamos a usar este departamento si tuviéramos que volver a Buenos Aires.

Somos una familia de Mendoza, Argentina, estuvimos cinco días alojados y verdaderamente nos vamos muy conformes con el depto. Tenía todo lo necesario para pasar unos días geniales, tiene todo lo que se ve en las imágenes y todavía un poco más.
El lugar está estratégicamente ubicado para moverse por Buenos Aires en transporte público, caminando o en auto. También en los alrededores hay mucho para visitar, comprar y pasear con mucha seguridad.
Perfecto lugar !

Todo perfecto. El departamento muy lindo. Tal como lo vez en las fotos. Ni más, ni menos. La zona muy buena, cerca de todo, tiendas, bares, transporte. La atención de Fernando, conserje del edificio muy buena,  siempre dispuesto a solucionar cualquier necesidad. La piscina estuvo excelente para los días de calor que nos tocó vivir en nuestra estadía.

Pasamos muy bien. No tuvimos ningún inconveniente. La ubicación es muy buena.
Lo único que el apartamento no tiene vista a la calle si no que da hacía atras, justo enfrente a los balcones de los otros vecinos. por un lado mejor porque no tenes los ruidos de la calle, pero se pierde un poco de intimidad.
El apartamento es como en las fotos. Muy cómodo y excelente ubicado. Gracias Savas por la hospitalidad y a Luciana que siempre se preocupo por todo. Muy recomendable. Saludos
Departamento muy bien ubicado, un poco pequeño, pero perfecto para dos personas. Tiene todas las comodidades necesarias.
El depto divino, los anfitriones muy amables, la zona perfecta para compras, salir a cenar y cerca de todo.

Pasamos unos días preciosos en el apartamento de Savas. Luciana nos atendió de forma excelente, permitiéndonos ingresar un poco antes del horario del check in y retirarnos unas horas luego del check out.

El apartamento estaba en buenas condiciones y muy limpio. Tiene las características que se indican en la publicación: aire acondicionado, cable, wifi con muy buen alcance y sobre todo, algo no menor, es que el agua caliente nunca se termina. 

Está igual a la fotos. Nosotros eramos 4 personas y para pasar unos días está bien. Si es para más tiempo, quizás resulte más cómo solo para dos personas. Aunque el sillón y la cama marinera eran muy cómodas. 

El edificio es muy nuevo, con posibilidad de acceder al gym, sauna y parrilla. Es muy seguro, con varias modalidades de seguridad. Muy tranquilo y sin ruidos. 

Barrio tranquilo, cercano a subte y transporte hacia varios lugares turísticos, a 4 cuadras de plaza serrano y 5 de santa fé. Muchas ofertas gastronómicas y de boliches, así como supermercados y tiendas de ropa. 

Recomiendo el apto y volvería a ir.

Gracias!
Sds
Fue una buena experiencia. Muy lindo apartamento en general.

El apartamento es tal cual como en las fotos, esta muy bien equipado y el edificio es muy seguro.
Esta muy bien ubicado todo a la mano.
Tanto Savas como Luciana, son muy buenos anfitriones, recomendado el sitio.
Volvere.

Excelente estadía en Bs As! El apto es tal cual las imágenes, equipado con todo, y el edificio es muy seguro. El portero es muy buena onda. Una de las mejores ubicaciones de la ciudad. Savas muy buen anfitrión y su staff nos recibió muy bien. Seguro vamos a volver.

Situado apartamento moderno y muy bien en el barrio de Palermo, situación calma, estudio funcional, piscina, sala de fitness y sauna a disposición. Internet wifi O.k. Éramos 2 adultos y un niño, comercios y un restaurante en las cercanías
Acogida muy buena de Lucianna para nuestra llegada, excelente dirección, a recomendar vivamente.

nuestra estadia fue muy buena, pasamos unos lindos dias en Buenos Aires y en el departamento de Savas, la ubicación esta buenisima! y el departamento en si esta muy bien equipado. Definitivamente me volveria a quedar ahi!

Apartamento muy funcional tal cual se ve en las fotos. El cuarto no esta cerrado pero no es un problema (fui con mis 2hijos que durmieron en el estar mirando la TV), bien equipado para nuestras necesidades. Lástima fuimos en invierno por lo que no pudimos disfrutar de piscina!. El encargado (Fernando) me facilito la acomodación del auto. Por ultimo Que puedo contar de la ubicación, sólo hay que ir para poder entenderlo.
Pasamos muy lindo. 
Recomendable

Aunque este apartamento es bonito y está bien ubicado, nuestra experiencia global fue muy negativa. El último día nos olvidamos en un cajón un sobre con un pasaporte y una cantidad considerable de euros. Nos dimos cuenta enseguida y volvimos al cabo de media hora. El sobre había desaparecido. En el apartamento sólo había entrado la señora de la limpieza y el encargado, a quien le dimos la llave del piso. La señora de la limpieza tuvo enseguida claro que el responsable era el encargado. Fuimos a hablar con él, lo negó todo y cada vez se pue poniendo más violento. Al cabo de un rato, el encargado apareció con el pasaporte pero ni rastro del dinero. No entendíamos nada. Tuvimos que llamar a la polícia ante lo surrealista de la situación. El encargado, en lugar de calmarse, se fue poniendo cada vez más agresivo y nos preguntó si habíamos buscado en las basuras. Ante su insistencia, me acompaño a mirar las basuras de todos los pisos y finalmente el sobre perdido "apareció" misteriosamente entre restos de comida. El encargado se fue dando un portazo. Al rato llegó Luciana, la compañera de Savas, y nos advirtió que era mejor alejarnos de allí porqué el encargado estaba armado. Fue todo muy desagradable. 

Aunque el apartamento está bien, no recomendaría a nadie alquilarlo hasta que no estén seguros que el encargado en cuestión no trabaja allí. Todo el mundo tenía claro que era el ladrón y que era una persona agresiba. Lo sorprendente es que fue la persona que nos dio la llave para abrir el piso y la persona a quien tuvimos que devolver la llave ante la imposibilidad del propietario de estar en el apartamento a la hora de nuestra llegada y de nuestra partida.
reviews.response:
I am sorry for the inconvenience caused, but I am very glad at the end everything worked out and nothing have been lost! 
Lo siento mucho para su inconveniencia, pero al final estoy contento que encontraron todo y no perdieron nada.

reviews.comments: Bonito apartamento. Limpio y muy espacioso para una pareja. Lo mejor, la ubicación.
Perfecta ubicación en pleno Palermo Soho. El piso es muy comodo, confortable y moderno. Altamente recomendable!!!!

Excelente apartamento muy lindo y cómodo, cumple con todo lo que dice en su descripción. Está en una zona muy centrica de Palermo pero las ventanas dan a un patio interior así que no hay nada de ruido y tiene cortinas blackout, en las noches es muy tranquilo.
Yo fui con mi señora y mi hijo de 2 años y nos sentimos muy bien, fue una excelente elección.

Muy bien ubicado, en la zona mas linda de Palermo. Luminoso, moderno.
Regresaría sin dudas en un próximo viaje!

ESTUPENDO departamento, MUY COMODO y muy practico por su LOCALIZACION en Buenos Aires.
Pasamos 2 semanas EXELENTES, mi familia se las pasó paseando
las dos semanas, yo solo una porque permanecí en un Congreso Medico en LA RURAL (a solo 5 cuadras del Depa) y me desplacé caminando.  Aparte de contar con TODAS LAS COMODIDADES, el departamento está situado en uno de los barrios MAS BUENOS de B.Aires (Palermo),  con la COMODIDAD de que muchos "colectivos" (CAMIONES) pasan a media cuadra y a 5 cuadras está la estacion de Subte (METRO),  por lo que nunca batallamos para desplazarnos a ninguna parte.   Visitamos tambien Colonia (Uruguay) en viaje de un dia (EXELENTISIMO)....   Asistimos al partido de Boca-Lanús (2-2) que tambien es una experiencia que debes vivir (increible),  fuimos a Recoleta, Caminito. San Telmo, Puerto Madero, Sr. Tango (NO es de "lo mejor") Hector Manzi (MUCHO MEJOR) y a otras "milongas"... visitamos el Panteon...(ÚNICO !!),  visitamos la casa rosada, plazita de Mayo, el Obelisco, la calle Florida.... y Mataderos...  durante mis actividades academicas en LA RURAL (de 8am a 6pm de Lunes a Viernes) mi familia visito El Tigre, Tierra Santa, el Mol Palermo y otros centros comerciales...  existen muchas ANTIGUEDADES en venta a buenos precios... LLEVEN POCO EQUIPAJE... porque se van a venir "BIEN CARGADOS"...  nosotros compramos DOS MALETAS EXTRAS... pues compramos muchas cositas que en México no existen,  o son MUY CARAS.

les recomiendo que PAGUEN todo con tarjeta de credito y que realizen los CAMBIOS DE MONEDA solo en el Banco de Argentina , para evitar que los timen con "billetes falsos" en el centro ... y CUIDEN MUCHO sus cosas (celulares-camaras-carteras, etc) en el Subte (Metro)... a mi hija le "desaparecieron" una camarita portatil y a mi esposa el Celular...  y eso que siempre nos estabamos "cuidando"... en ESO hay muchos EXPERTOS...  por lo demás, les recomiendo comer-cenar en La Escondida y en La Paila (a 3 cuadras del Depa, por la calle Costa Rica... las pizzas del Kentuky de Santá Fé y Thames estan ESTUPENDAS...  y para "salir del apuro", en cuanto a la comida,  pueden llegar al TENEDOR LIBRE... un muy economico BUFETT con un muy buen surtido para complacer a los más exigentes (Thames casi esquina con Santa Fé)
Nosotros compramos frutas, verduras y  "fiambres"  en las tienditas (kioskos) cercanos, muy frescos y muy baratos.

BUENOS AIRES....    VAMOS A REGRESAR PRONTO !!!!

Excelente! Eso resume todo! El local ademá de ser muy bién ubicado (muy cerca de plaza serrano) es fantástico, lindo, limpio y muy seguro. La atención tanto de Savas, Luciana o de la gente del predio (Fernando que es el encargado) y Roberto que es seguridad, fue 110%.
Estuve por 5 dias a trabajo en Bs As y mi señora me acompaño. El depto trae todas las comodidades, es muy bién decorado, la cama es muy confortable, los muebles en excelente estado, el baño super bueno. Toda anda muy bié, el local es tranquilo y sin ruidos, perfecto a descansar despues de un dia largo de tarbajo. 
Savas deja mapas, dicas de comidas para entregar en casa (ricas empanadas de Cumen-Cumen) y hasta un kit de primeros socorros hay!
Yo seguramente regresaré y indico con 100% de confianza!
Saludos,
Christian

A great apartment in a fantastic location. The building is also very nice and has good amenities. I'd definitely stay at this apartment again. Additionally, the host's been great, very accommodating and helpful. Really nice people. Highly recommendable.

Nous sommes restés 2 nuits chez Savas. Savas avait tout prévu pour notre accueil. L'appartement est très bien situé dans un quartier animé. Nous avons eu tout ce dont nous avions besoin. Tout était parfait. Je recommande !
Excellent location, right in the heart of Palermo. Close to a lot of fantastic restaurants, bars, cafes. Lovely apartment with everything you could need for a lovely stay in Buenos Aires!
The apartment was in a very hip location, lots of cafes and bars close by. Apartment as pictured and host was very accommodating, would recommend!

The location of the appartement is great. Close to everything you need. Nice swimming pool and facilities to do your own bbq. The appartement itself is great for 2 people.  For a family of 4 could be quite small. For the rest we had a great staying

L'abitazione è stata perfetta:comoda per visitare Buenos Aires e fornita di tutto il necessario per un completo soggiorno...ottima anche la piscina per un po' di relax dal caldo argentino! Grazie...tutto perfetto!
It was a great stay! Check in and check out were very easy! The apartment was just what we needed to explore palermo!

Perfeito.

O apartamento possui uma excelente localização, perto do metro, restaurantes, supermercado, cafés, etc, além de ficar a poucos passos de duas excelentes lojas de vinhos. O apartamento é exatamente como mostrado nas fotos e estava limpo e arrumado. A cama é bem confortável, o chuveiro possui ducha forte e o sistema de aquecimento funciona muito bem. O check in e check out foram realizados sem maiores problemas e apesar de não estar na cidade no período que nos hospedamos, o Savas se demonstrou bastante atencioso e enviou pessoas cordiais e prestativas. Recomendamos fortemente e pretendemos voltar em breve.
Great experience. Savas was so helpful and quick to reply to emails etc. loved the apartment and we all had a great time. Thank you
Loved the apartment and the neighborhood - everything was as described.

This apartment is wonderful, comfortable, sunny, and in a fantastic location within walking distance to all the best of Palermo Soho, Palermo Hollywood, and Palermo Viejo. We were two friends visiting - one slept on the bed and the other slept on the couch and both were very comfortable! The apartment is exactly as described here and we were 100% satisfied!
Apartment was great! The best Area to stay in Buenos Aires. Great security Guy And Nice women who helped us with everything. The fact that there was a pool made our stay complete!
Great apartment, great host. Everything worked very well. Many thanks.
Nice Place in a charming neighbourhood... I didn't See Savas but his people cared about everything .

The apartment was clean, comfortable, and perfect for me and my sister. In a great location in Palermo, perfect for me and my sister to spend a few days in the city. The outdoor patio is a huge plus, not to mention the pool, workout room and laundry in the building. Luciana was very helpful in showing us around the apartment and the building when we arrived and it was comforting to know she was available to help with any questions or concerns we may have had.  I would recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a great place to stay in a fun neighborhood!
Mil gracias a Manuela y a Fernando! We had a great stay. Great location. Quiet, yet near everything we needed.

Savas is a great host; we didn't have any problem with the check-in and the check-out.
The apartment is really comfortable, the swimming pool and the terrace are a big plus! 
The location is perfect, in the middle of Palermo Soho next to a lot of coffees and restaurants!
We had a great time!

Accueil parfait de Luciana lors de notre arrivée. Elle nous a très précisément décrit comment fonctionnait l'appartement et la résidence. 
L'appartement est parfait pour 2, très bien équipé et totalement conforme aux photos sur le site. Le quartier est super aussi, plein de vie et de commerces branchés. On n'est pas loin du métro.
Seul petit bémol : la résidence n'est pas très bien isolée phoniquement. 
Nous reviendrons avec plaisir dans cet appartement lors de notre prochain séjour déjà Buenos Aires !

My husband and I had a great time in BA. Saves' apartment is in a good part of time and is nice and secure. His assistant met us there and was really friendly and showed us how everything worked. It's close to shops and the metro and his apartment nice and clean. Our only feedback is that it would have been handy if the kitchen was equipped with a few more basic essentials (eg oil etc) as we weren't really able to cook

I surely recommend Savas' place. The apartment is like in the pictures and Palermo is definitely the place to stay.
Savas and Luciana were very easy to communicate with and everything was fine, plus Fernando the janitor of the building is super helpful. We had only one minor problem with the safe that could not be fixed, but it was not a big deal at all. Bring earplugs because the neighbours can be noisy.
Tivemos uma ótima estadia!! Fomos recebidos pela Luciana, que foi super simpática e solícita. O apartamento é lindo, limpo e muito bem localizado. Super indico!!!

Savas's assistant Luciana made us feel right at home and was always available if we needed anything! They did everything to accommodate us when our flight to Buenos Aires arrived late. The apartment looked exactly like the pictures - very clean, spacious and comfortable. The building was very also very nice, modern, and safe. The location was absolutely perfect, located in the heart of the lively neighborhood of Palermo Soho and walking distance to amazing restaurants, cafes, and shops! We would recommend this apartment to anyone!

We loved our stay at Savas's apartment! The location is perfect - a walkable distance from many of the best restaurants/activities/bars BA has to offer. The building was modern, beautiful, safe, and had plenty of accommodations to make our stay even better. The apartment was comfortable and had everything one could need for an enjoyable time. We would recommend it to anyone!

Savas' appartment is the greatest thing ever in Palermo. Perfect size, well stocked with everything you need and there was great communication with him and his adequate assistant. Would recommend this place to everyone!

Apartment is really central in de Palermo barrio. Easy to get around with Subte (Plaza Italia) and the collectivos (busses). Apartment is cozy and suitable for 2 persons. It fits all important needs (including gym and pool). Two things that could be improved. 1. Sound: You can hear your neighbours. We had to reach out and ask to lower the volume. 2. Bed: Matress seems a bit old and used. Overall we had an OK experience. Savas and his assistent are really approachable and returned to our messages within the hour. And we have been welcomed by the assistent of Savas, which is also important.

We were welcomed by Luciana who was very helpful to explain the apartment, building and neighbourhood. The apartment was as described, lots of light, comfortable and clean.

It is small..studio like so the bedroom is not totally private, ideal for one person or a couple. The couch in the living room makes into a bed if you don't sleep together but that makes it a bit cramped. The kitchen is equipped with the basics. Stores are very close and the location is great..

Wonderful apartment! Had everything that we could have wanted to make our time in Argentina as pleasurable as possible. We were greeted as we arrived and was given a full rundown of the Palermo neighborhood and Buenos Aires as a whole. This was extremely helpful and got us started on the right foot. We could not have had a better time!

The description was accurate and the apartment was well-kept. Convenient location to the hip area of Palermo with lots of restaurants and bars nearby. Ms. Luciana was readily available to address any concerns!

This flat ROCKS if you are looking for a place that is smack dab in the middle of Palermo Soho! 

Savas is a wonderful host. 
The place is definitely snug for 4 guests, but perfect for 2. 

;)

The apartment is great and in a wonderful location. The area is totally safe and has a ton of fun things to do within walking distance - bars , restaurants, park, etc. 
There is also a modest work out area and a pool.
Luciana who works with Savas, met us the day we arrived and was very helpful in showing us everything. 
One thing I'd recommend is saving 2 peso coins to do your laundry with - sometimes they are tough to find but we had no problems asking cabs and supermarkets for them.

It was perfect. The flat is great: airy, sunny, clean and fresh, with everything you need inside (more kitchen utensils than I have at home..). The location really can't get any better -plus totally safe and full of nice places, a plus as I was travelling on my own.
The host even took care of my health and recommended a clinic to check a skin infection!
Luciana and Fernando took care of all the details, arranged for taxis (Julian, very nice local driver) and gave advice on where to go.
Thanks Sava/ Cleo and team!
Great apartment in a lovely neighborhood. Sava's offers a clean and calm refugee in the busy Palermo area, including sauna, gym and a pool. Would definitely stay there again.

Savas was very welcoming and was flexible with our awkward arrival time. Everything was as described in the listing, and the building manager made us feel equally welcome whenever we would greet him. We felt very cared for throughout our stay as we had an open line of communication with our host, and a very thorough neighborhood, city, and building guidebook were provided at the apartment. 
The location is also terrific for this apartment. So walkable to the city's best dining, nightlife, shopping, and parks, and very central for taxis or public transit. Would highly recommend this space to any traveler or pair!
Nice clean, modern apt in a great location right in Palermo Soho. Definitely recommend to anyone traveling to BA.

Fantastic location. Great host. Fab apartment. 
All in a wonderful city. What else could you ask for. 
Highly recommended.

O apartamento é como o anúnciado, é pequeno porém bem mobiliado e tudo funciona corretamente, mas as tomadas são bem diferentes das brasileiras. Tivemos um problema com a luz em um dos dias da viagem, algo que o porteiro poderia ter resolvido mas era final de semana e ele não trabalhava... no entanto quando entramos em contato com o Savas ele foi muito solicito e resolveu rapidamente. Savas é um ótimo anfitrião. O porteiro 24hrs não fica 24hrs. O apartamento é pequeno para 4 adultos, indicaria melhor para uma família com crianças. E os vizinhos tem cachorros, porém não gostam de barulho, e não são receptivos a turmas de jovens. O bairro é seguro, e há muitos restaurantes por perto, também há mercado e quitanda, fica perto do plaza serrano onde há barzinhos a noite e boates, no domingo tem uma feirinha muito bacana, e em tudo isso dá pra ir andando. Amamos a localização.

The location is great, not far from the subway. We loved the neighborhood (a lot of nice graffiti), very calm and safe. We feel like home because it dosn't seem very touristic. The restaurant Wasabi's is a must do for the sushis lovers (and it's like 2 minutes walk from the studio). It was clean, and functional. It's good to have a lot of advices books for Buenos Aires.

But it's not a big place (well, it IS a 48m2) and the bed is a bit small when you're tall.

Neighbors were noisy by night and if you do'nt close the curtains, you are seen by the neighbors opposite. Also there is a dog barking on the same floor.

Advice for the host: It would be better to have more than one toilet paper and one trash bag for one week.
reviews.response: Dear Ilona. Thank you very much for your good words. The exact size of the apartment is clearly stated in the description. Same applies for the bed.  Sorry if you haven`t read it carefully.

reviews.comments: We had a great time and everything was fine. It is a nice and really quiet place in the middle of Palermo. Communication and reception were excellent!

The photos do not lie, Savas has a very nice studio/one-bed, brilliantly presented in a very nice, clean building in the heart of Soho. It was a perfect base for us to enjoy one of our favourite places in the world - so many great bars, restaurants, cafes, shops five minutes from our doorstep. Check in was very easy, with the building's superintendent aware of our arrival and Savas' agent waiting for us outside the building. Check out was equally hassle-free. We would highly recommend a stay here. It's such great value too.

Great location! You will find everything you need just a short walk away including the metro (subte)
The apartment is just as described. The curtains are great!!! No light gets through so sleeping during the day is no problem. 
Has a nice pool too.
Check in and check out went very smoothly. All my emails were answered very fast as well.
I would definitely recommend this apartment!

Apartment is well located in the right neighborhood.
It is not for 4 persons (extra small coach-bed): 2 is a max and the pictures makes it bigger as it is really. Close neighbor vis-a-vis. Good air conditioning. Safe building.
Main point is that the apartment definitely lacks maintenance : old and spotted linens (towels, sheets, pillows), missing or dis functioning curtains, spotted sofa, dirty bathroom seals...
which doesn't give a good impression of this place.
Low value for money.
reviews.response:
Hi Eric. 
Thank you for sharing .
I cannot respond to how you felt, but I can certainly respond to the facts mentioned:
1. We have 8 set of towels and linens. For every guest we give 2 freshly cleaned towels and 2 freshly cleaned linens straight from the Professional Laundry Cleaner.
We NEVER had any complaint 99 reviews BEFORE yours (even 3 days before yours!!!)
2. We give special attention to details and the house is in maintenance  regularly. We are obsessive with cleaningless and that shows in ALL our reviews.
3. The apartment ranks in the top 10 positions continously the last 3 years and it is no 1 in the WISH LIST. For good reasons. Certainly GOOD VALUE for MONEY is one of them.

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed to be in the appartement. everything was clean and the fotos are real. Perfect A/C during the hot time in summer. The location is perfect to go out for dinning and enjoying day and night. We felt always vey secure with the porter on the front office.

We had such a nice time during our visit in Buenos Aires. Our experience with this Funky & Stylish Apartment in Palermo could not have gone any better. We really felt like part of the neighborhood and the check-in and check-out process went very smooth. Savas was very accommodating and the condo was just like it looks in the pictures. It was the perfect place for a couple to stay. We also really enjoyed that there was a beautiful swimming pool area that we could use as it was VERY hot when we were visiting. The area that this condo is in, is truly the best area in Buenos Aires. It was easy to walk around and find restaurants and shops as well as access to the subte. It was also very quiet which was nice when we wanted to go to bed. We wish we could have stayed longer! We highly recommend this condo for anyone who visits Buenos Aires.

Clean, quiet apartment in neighbourhood filled with many small and delicious restaurants. Never met Savas but were able to communicate electronically with his assistant Luciana. Apartment centrally located (and we enjoy walking) so usually walked to our destinations (and felt comfortable walking even in evening). Apartment is not far from subway (Subte) and on local bus routes, but with no Spanish we never figured out routes or costs. We would have appreciated info (in English) about how to use these services. As other guests mentioned, bed was short for my husband (1.9 meters). We had problems with shower head spraying in all directions, especially as no extra towels or mats for floor and no plug for bathtub.

My parents and I had an amazing experience at Savas apartment. We did not get a chance to meet him as he was away, but he was very quick in responding to our emails. We felt very safe as the location is very central and just by walking a few blocks you will be at the nearest train station, Plaza Italia and bus stops on the Ave, Santa Fe. We were greeted by Fernando, who is the doorman during the day, and he was just an amazing person who gave us great advice for places to see and eat among other things. It helps if you are fluent in Spanish or know your basics. The apartment was perfect for just us three. Plenty of light, and these curtains that need a little updating, as you have to be careful to pull or they will get stuck, but when cooperating will give you plenty of privacy. The sofa needs a better upkeep as the mattress would sink you in a bit, but regardless I still slept fine.The ac was great since the time we stayed there was very hot outside, and having access to the pool is also helpful. Kitchen is well stocked, and they also have tour book guides in their library which help, if you need to borrow them and help in getting around BA. We met Luciana on our last day and she was very nice and helpful. Overall amazing place to stay at and was just happy my parents were satisfied. Thank you so much Savas, Fernando and Luciana and hope to come to BA and have more memorable experiences. All the best.

Je suis venue à Palermo fin novembre 2013.
L'appartement est situé au meilleur endroit possible, dans une rue au coeur de Palermo. Il est très clean et sympa. On ne voit pas le propriétaire, mais son assistante, Luciana, très sympathique et qui fait le maximum pour rendre service sur les horaires d'arrivée et de départ.
Trois petites restrictions : La chambre n'est pas close. Les lits très bons mais un peu courts (le lit du salon ne convient pas pour une personne de plus d'1m60). Et je m'étonne aussi de l'affichage du prix qui ne correspond pas : en octobre il était affiché à 52 euros,et au moment du paiement il est passé à 61. Je vois qu'il est toujours affiché à 52 en décembre....
Sinon, aucun problème, vous pouvez aller chez Savas, en toute sécurité.
Sylvie, France.

We loved the apartment and its location. The Palermo Soho neighborhood is charming and well located. The apartment fully met out needs: there was nice natural light, the apartment was quiet, the bed was comfortable (if short for a person over 6 feet, though), there was ample space for cooking, the bathroom was nice with a good shower, the gym was nicely appointed and we were very happy to have a laundry room. Be prepared with the necessary coins if you want to do any laundry, though.  We went to several stores, banks and change places trying to get the 1 and 2 peso coins needed to operate the machines. 

Savas was out of town, but his colleague Luciana was very responsive and very helpful. Although we didn’t meet in person, we spoke on the phone and she immediately answered the few e-mails we sent.  She also arranged the taxi that arrived punctually at 6 AM to take us to the airport for our international flight.   

The down sides were minor. The sliding glass door on the balcony didn’t lock and we were told that fixing it would require replacing the glass panels. With the aid of a screwdriver that we bought at the local hardware store, we adjusted a few screws on the strike plate and easily fixed the door.  I would also have liked a couple more wine glasses and/or glass glasses. The apartment came with only one wineglass and one glass, in addition to coffee mugs and plastic glasses. 

In sum, the apartment was great and we would heartily recommend it to anyone visiting Buenos Aires.

Don't hesitate. Book it now! Apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures with comfortable bed, sweet little kitchen with everything you need, great aircon, awesome gym and pool in complex. Bathroom has lovely hot shower with great water pressure. Apartment is located in the best part of Buenos Aires right in Palermo Soho! Cool boutiques and restuarants/bars just around the corner, subway just a few blocks walk. There is also a little Carrefour around the corner for all your grocery needs. Savas provided us with a local's guide to BA which was much appreciated too. We did not meet him but his assistant Luciana was fantastic, answered all our questions and was constantly available on email/phone with rapid almost immediate responses. The apartment is a great base for exploring this most fabulous city. We spent over two weeks in this apartment and it felt like home on the first day. There are also two bikes to rent, but we didn't as we preferred to walk everywhere. Honestly, we were so impressed with this apartment and would recommend it without hesitation. It's literally perfect for two people who want to spend time in BA. Modern, neat, and completely convenient. Thank you Savas and Luciana!
We gave a right decision to rent this apartment. Location was perfect. The apartment was very comfortable and had all you would need. Savas and Luciana was so helpful during our stay.

A truly charming studio apartment. The building is well located, secure and very stylish. We were impressed with the apartment's furnishings, its sunny patio, and relaxing atmosphere. The unit faces the interior, so virtually no street noise, which helped for sleeping in on our vacation. The property is well maintained and very clean.  As for the location, superb! Close to hip shops, excellent restaurants and a charming plaza where all the action is. We were thrilled with the variety of food offered by all the restaurants within walking distance. Overall, one of our best experiences with an Airbnb rental.

Excelente apartamento. As fotos mostram o que se encontra lá. Tranquilo, silencioso, muito limpo e bem iluminado. Internet wifi funcionou bem e foi importante para meu trabalho. Bem localizado em Palermo Soho, perto de tudo de bom que tem o bairro. Recomendo sem dúvidas.

I was not able to meet Savas, but I met his assistant, Luciana, who was lovely. The place was in an amazing location - close to everything in Palermo. When we checked out, Luciana also made sure to ask about every part of the stay, in case there was anything to improve for future guests. It's good knowing that Savas and Luciana actually care and look to improve the unit for guests. 

One thing - the place is a bit small - smaller than I expected. It would probably be much more comfortable for two people (I stayed with three total). With three, there is no place to relax in the living room without putting the sofa bed back together every day. Though, of course, you could also relax in one of the many coffee shops in the area. But all in all, a fantastic stay.
reviews.response:
Hi Brian. I am so happy you liked everything and enjoyed our hospitality in BsAs.
Regarding the size of the apartment, is pretty evident in the airbnb post exactly how big it is and its exact configuration.They correspond exactly to the real dimensions of the apartment.
Waiting to host you again!

reviews.comments:
O apartamento está muito bem localizado, junto a vários restaurantes, bares, mercados, outlets, Av. Santa Fé. 
Muito bem decorado e funcional. 
Me hospedei com minha esposa e minha mãe durante uma semana e tudo correu muito bem. 
Infelizmente, não pude conhecer Savas, pois estava viajando na Grécia. Mas fui muito bem atendido por Luciana e outro rapaz (não lembro o nome). O encarregado do prédio também sempre foi muito cortês conosco. 
Enfim, recomendo fortemente essa hospedagem. Certamente retornarei. 
Se alguém quiser maiores informações, disponibilizo meu e-mail: (EMAIL HIDDEN)
À disposição.

super appartement. moderne, beau, avec tout le nécessaire! je le recommande vivement. de plus, il est super bien placé ! 
vraiment top!
this was a great home base for us in BA. lovely neighborhood and building. beautiful open space that fit my husband and i and our two boys perfectly. thanks again!

Unfortunately we didn't have the opportunity to meet Savas, but his assistant was accommodating.  Upon check-in she made sure that we knew where everything was located and how to use it.  

The photos of the apartment are true to the appearance of the actual apartment.  It was a nice cozy space for me and my boyfriend.  The heated bathroom floor is a plus.  BsAs can be cold in the winter, so the heating system was much appreciated and worked well.  

The apartment is very well located.  This is my 3rd visit to BsAs and my first time staying in Palermo.  There are plenty of restaurants, boutiques, cafes, independent bookshops, and bars around, along with streets that each have their own character.  Staying in Palermo is much more relaxing and enjoyable than staying in the center.  

I highly recommend this apartment.

Apartamento confortável e bem equipado com utensílios de cozinha,secador de cabelos e aquecedor potente para os dias de inverno. Próximo a pontos de interesse no bairro. Fiquei positivamente surpresa quando encontrei vários adaptadores de tomada - fato que não havia me ocorrido antes!
Agradeço a hospitalidade e recomendo!

Many interesting cafes, restaurants, and shops within walking distance. Savas' guest guide has a lot of helpful info. Nice to receive the pdf ahead of the trip. A few blocks away from Plaza Italia/Av Santa Fe, where you find Subte line D and many buses going to many places. The neighbors were pretty quite most of the time during our stay except a Saturday night when an apt across the courtyard had a party and loud music went on till around 4 am.

Simplesmente maravilhoso, decoração linda, e o apartamento é muito quentinho, a localização é ótima, tem cafés, restaurantes e bares para todos os gostos e bolsos, pode se andar a noite tranquilamente, e para conhecer outros bairros sempre tem um taxi passando em frente, e aconselhamos andar muito de taxi, o maior valor que pagamos foi $75,00 (pesos argentinos), muito mais tranquilo que o transito intenso. E a nossa dica de restaurante pertinho é o crepe do Chez, muito recheado, cerveja  gelada e um ambiente lindo. Voltamos apaixonados por Buenos Aires e com certeza vamos voltar a cidade.
Savas has a very nice place - the apartment is super clean, in the middle of the action in Buenos Aires, and makes a great HQ for your stay in the city. Highly recommended!

The appartment is super nice and place to go! Especially loved the pool to go swimming every Morning. Also the neighbourhood in Palermo is very loveley and Savas self made guide for nice places at Buenos Aires was very helpful.
When you go there you have to eat steak at Don Julio which is just around the corner. Also the many boutiques in Palermo are a shopping paradise whith very unique clothing. We only had 3 days which is defenitely not enough for such a nice city. At least one week is a must.
The place is really nice and comfortable. Perfect for one or two people. The location is great, just two blocks away from the center of Palermo Soho.
Savas and Luciana were wonderful hosts and really helpful. The apartment is lovely and in a fantastic location in Palermo close to bars, restaurants and fantastic shops. Highly recommended!

Really perfect location in trendy Palermo! We loved staying here- the apartment is modern- has everything you need- easy in and out- great building manager helped us find the laundry room and answered Lur questions. Secure- super clean and nicely appointed. nice building pool too! Host was responsive- sent us great tips -  highly recommend.

PROS: This apartment was clean and tastefully decorated, located in a very nice and hip area. Restaurants, cafes and shopping are within walking distance. CONS: Hosts are Unaccommodating, Unavailable and Condescending.
 I thought it was cultural differences at first with previous emails but when the same behavior continued after we checked in, I start to feel uncomfortable with the approach! Savas was OOCountry during our visit and Luciana was going to check us in. When we arrived, Fernando, (sweetest doorman) told us that Luciana was going to be there in 30 mins. Generally, the host are already waiting for us when we arrive. It was late and we were tired and hungry. In 30 mins came a man who didn't look too happy, telling us that Luciana was out of town and that he was checking us in instead. We were only given one set of keys so I emailed Luciana and Savas that night requesting for another set since my friend and I have different plans and would be inconvenient for us to share one set of keys. Luciana responded, "Jade, I am out of the city until monday, so I cant give you another set of key until then!" We checked in Friday night and checking out Tuesday, meaning that we would have to stress over the key business almost the entire stay. On the next email response from Savas, he said, "For security reasons we do not provide a second set of keys. This is our permanent policy and please try to respect it. So far with more than a 100 different guests from all over the world, hasn' t been a problem. Please try to find a way to manage." Hmmm... this apartment can potentially accommodate 4 people. Unless more than 100 of his previous guests are solo travelers or couples who are join at the hip, it's hard to believe that it hasn't been a problem to have one set of keys to be shared among all parties? And "please try to respect it"? implying that this is an unreasonable request? And "Please try to find a way to manage"! Sounds hospitable enough? On this trip, we have stayed at 4 airbnbs and each of them offered 2 sets of keys without being asked, except for this one. One of them even offered 3 sets. On another email, Luciana told us to make a copy of the key since she cant get someone to get into the office to get the keys for us before Monday and Savas is telling us this. All these just dont add up. Rather than getting into an email war with them, we just "found a way to manage" since by the time we get this resolved we would be checking out. Needless to say, it was a frustrating ordeal. Unless you are willing to put up with the bad attitude and inferior hospitality, and have the patience to coordinate the key business, you are much better off staying elsewhere.
reviews.response: After having hosted more than 100 guests out of which 60+ from Airbnb, with raving reviews, I had this one. So either the other 99 were wrong and this one was right that I am a bully and not a nice person or.... I don't know the stats just don't lie do they? What I have to say is that I excect from my guests to show respect and understanding. We are not hotels, we are just ordinary people, we try to make the world a better place for us and the others, but that presupposes empathy and respect. Jade lacked both: did not respect the House Rule (one set of keys per apartment as clearly is stated in the airbnb site of my apartment) and failed to understand why propably there are good reasons behind this policy (never bothered to ask!). Moving on, though, and 100% committed to total guest satisfaction (with a success rate of 99% till now !) . That alone is a big incentive to go on...

reviews.comments: We had a great time, and the apartment was an ideal location. The pool was an added bonus!
Fantastic

Savas place is really a great place to stay if you wanna have a relaxed city trip in Buenos Aires! The Appartement is in a really good condition - exactly as shawn on the photos- you are in the heart of Palermo, which is the best neighbourhood if you wanna have all accomodations nearby! We felt save all the time and can really rekommend Savas place. Good host! Perfect Handling :-)

Had such an amazing time in this apartment!! it is beautiful, so neat and just like the pictures. the location was perfect in palermo, there was lots of great boutiques and cafes. thankyou SO much for having us savas!!
